Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
encrypt \encrypt\ v. t. to convert ordinary language into code; to hide the meaning of a message by converting it into a form that cannot be interpreted without knowing the secret method for interpretation, called the key.
Syn: encode, code, encipher, cipher, cypher, inscribe, write in code. [WordNet 1.5]

encrypt v : convert ordinary language into code; "We should encode the message for security reasons" [syn: {encode}, {code}, {encipher}, {cipher}, {cypher}, {inscribe}, {write in code}] [ant: {decode}]
